nodes.text: Omar 1 was a Deep Space Manufacturing Facility located at Omar. It was owned by Sienar Fleet Systems. During the Galactic Civil War, it produced TIE Avengers for the Galactic Empire. Omar 1 and its two sister stations were attacked by Imperial forces loyal to Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin, who sought to destroy the facilities in the First Battle of Omar. The facility was completely evacuated before it was destroyed by Zaarin.
